mapper.select: SELECT A.BNKACCTKY, A.BNKPRODUCTKY, A.ACCTID, A.ACCTNAME, A.DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE, A.ISOCURRENCYCDKY, A.FIID, A.FIIDTYPE, A.FIIDTYPEENUM, A.DSPLYCDIRFIID, A.DSPLYPDIRFIID, A.ISSRCXFERENABLED, A.ISDESTXFERENABLED, A.MAXXFERAMT, A.MINXFERAMT, A.MAXPMTAMT, A.MINPMTAMT, A.VERSIONSTAMP as VERSIONSTAMP, A.UPDATEDTTM, A.UPDATEUSER, A.BRANCHID, A.PRODUCTCODE, E.BNKPRODSUBTYPEKY, E.BNKPRODTYPEKY, E.CORORGKYFI, E.NAME, E.DESCRIPTION, E.ACCTNUMDSPLYMASK, E.ISNONDSPLYREPLACE, E.MASKREPLACECHAR, E.ISPMTENABLEDNSC, E.DFLTTRNDTRANGE, E.DFLTFUTTRNDTRANGE, E.DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE as DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE_FORPRODUCT, E.ISSTMTASIMG, E.ISSTMTFROMLOCAL, E.ISREALTIMEACCTTRN, E.ISVIEWTRNIMG, E.TRNIMGVIEWLENGTH, E.ISACTIVATED, E.LISTORDER, E.ISREALTIMEACCTSUM, E.ACCTTYPE, E.ISREALTIMESTMT, E.ISTRNACTRPTAVAIL, E.ASSETLIABILITY, E.TRNHISTRETENTION, E.ISMEMOPOSTAVAIL, E.ISREALTIMEMEMOPT, E.ISPRODUCTINSURED, E.PRODUCTCODE, E.ISPRODUCTDELETED, E.DELETEREQUESTDTTM, E.CUTOFFTIME, E.CUTOFFDAYCNT, E.ACHCUTOFFTIME, E.ACHCUTOFFDAYCNT, E.UPDATEDTTM as UPDATEDTTM_FORPRODUCT, E.UPDATEUSER as UPDATEUSER_FORPRODUCT, E.VERSIONSTAMP as VERSIONSTAMP_FORPRODUCT FROM BNKACCT A, BNKPRODUCT E WHERE E.PRODUCTCODE = A.PRODUCTCODE AND A.ISOCURRENCYCDKY = #{currencyOid} AND A.FIID = #{fiId} AND A.ACCTID = #{accountId} AND A.PRODUCTCODE = #{productCode}

select E.ACCTNUMDSPLYMASK, E.ISNONDSPLYREPLACE, E.MASKREPLACECHAR FROM BNKACCT A ,BNKPRODUCT E WHERE A.BNKPRODUCTKY = E.BNKPRODUCTKY AND A.BNKACCTKY = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}
mapper.sql: SELECT ACCTID FROM ( SELECT (CASE WHEN V.DESCRIPTION = 'Deposit' then 1 else 2 End) as PRODUCTTYPE, A.ACCTID as ACCTID FROM BNKACCT A INNER JOIN BNKACCTADDLIDFR I on A.BNKACCTKY=I.BNKACCTKY INNER JOIN BNKCUSTACCT C on A.BNKACCTKY=C.BNKACCTKY INNER JOIN BNKPRODUCT P on A.BNKPRODUCTKY=P.BNKPRODUCTKY INNER JOIN VFMPRODTYPE V on P.BNKPRODTYPEKY=V.VFMPRODTYPEKY WHERE C.CORCUSTOMERKY = #{companyOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} AND I.ACCTADDLIDFR1=#{addIdfr} AND I.ACCTPMTTYPEENUM = #{addIdfrType} AND V.DESCRIPTION in ('Deposit','Credit','Loan') AND A.ISOCURRENCYCDKY = #{currCdKy,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} AND A.FIID = #{fiId} ) ORDER BY PRODUCTTYPE, ACCTID
mapper.select:
SELECT BNKACCTKY,SOAINSTRID FROM BNKACCT WHERE SOAINSTRID IN
#{acctUUID}
mapper.sql: SELECT A.ACCTID as ACCTID FROM BNKACCT A INNER JOIN BNKACCTADDLIDFR I on A.BNKACCTKY=I.BNKACCTKY INNER JOIN BNKCUSTACCT C on A.BNKACCTKY=C.BNKACCTKY WHERE A.ACCTID = #{acctId} AND A.ISOCURRENCYCDKY = #{currCdKy,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} AND A.FIID = #{fiId} AND C.CORCUSTOMERKY = #{companyOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} AND I.ACCTADDLIDFR1 = #{addIdfr} AND I.ACCTPMTTYPEENUM = #{addIdfrType}
SELECT A.ACCTNAME as ACCTNAME FROM BNKACCT A WHERE A.ACCTID = #{acctId} AND A.ISOCURRENCYCDKY = #{currCdKy,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler} AND A.FIID = #{fiId}

BNKACCTKY, BNKPRODUCTKY, ISOCURRENCYCDKY, HISTORYSTATUSCD, ACCTID, INTERESTRATE, HISTENDDATE, ISSRCXFERENABLED, ISDESTXFERENABLED, MAXXFERAMT, MINXFERAMT, MAXPMTAMT, MINPMTAMT, TRNIMGVIEWLENGTH, HISTRETENTIONLGTH, FIID, BRANCHID, PRODUCTCODE, HISTREQUESTCD, ACCTNAME, FIIDTYPE, UPDATEDTTM, UPDATEUSER, VERSIONSTAMP, FIIDTYPEENUM, DSPLYCDIRFIID, DSPLYPDIRFIID, BANKNAME, DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from BNKACCT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into BNKACCT (BNKACCTKY, BNKPRODUCTKY, ISOCURRENCYCDKY, HISTORYSTATUSCD, ACCTID, INTERESTRATE, HISTENDDATE, ISSRCXFERENABLED, ISDESTXFERENABLED, MAXXFERAMT, MINXFERAMT, MAXPMTAMT, MINPMTAMT, TRNIMGVIEWLENGTH, HISTRETENTIONLGTH, FIID, BRANCHID, PRODUCTCODE, HISTREQUESTCD, ACCTNAME, FIIDTYPE, UPDATEDTTM, UPDATEUSER, VERSIONSTAMP, FIIDTYPEENUM, DSPLYCDIRFIID, DSPLYPDIRFIID, BANKNAME, DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE) values (#{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}, #{productOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}, #{isoCurrencyCdOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}, #{historyStatusCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{historyEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isSrcXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler}, #{isDestXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler}, #{maximumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minimumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{maximumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minimumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trnImgViewLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{historyRetentionLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{fiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{histRequestCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fiIdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionStamp,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{fiIdTypeEnum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{displayCDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayPDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultHistoryTrnDateRange,jdbcType=SMALLINT})

mapper.update:
update BNKACCT
BNKACCTKY = #{record.oid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler},
BNKPRODUCTKY = #{record.productOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler},
ISOCURRENCYCDKY = #{record.isoCurrencyCdOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler},
HISTORYSTATUSCD = #{record.historyStatusCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
ACCTID = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERESTRATE = #{record.interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HISTENDDATE = #{record.historyEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ISSRCXFERENABLED = #{record.isSrcXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
ISDESTXFERENABLED = #{record.isDestXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
MAXXFERAMT = #{record.maximumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MINXFERAMT = #{record.minimumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAXPMTAMT = #{record.maximumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MINPMTAMT = #{record.minimumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRNIMGVIEWLENGTH = #{record.trnImgViewLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
HISTRETENTIONLGTH = #{record.historyRetentionLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FIID = #{record.fiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCHID = #{record.branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTCODE = #{record.productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HISTREQUESTCD = #{record.histRequestCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
ACCTNAME = #{record.accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIIDTYPE = #{record.fiIdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEDTTM = #{record.updateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEUSER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSIONSTAMP = #{record.versionStamp,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FIIDTYPEENUM = #{record.fiIdTypeEnum,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DSPLYCDIRFIID = #{record.displayCDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DSPLYPDIRFIID = #{record.displayPDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKNAME = #{record.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE = #{record.defaultHistoryTrnDateRange,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

update BNKACCT set BNKACCTKY = #{record.oid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}, BNKPRODUCTKY = #{record.productOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}, ISOCURRENCYCDKY = #{record.isoCurrencyCdOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}, HISTORYSTATUSCD = #{record.historyStatusCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ACCTID = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERESTRATE = #{record.interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HISTENDDATE = #{record.historyEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ISSRCXFERENABLED = #{record.isSrcXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler}, ISDESTXFERENABLED = #{record.isDestXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler}, MAXXFERAMT = #{record.maximumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINXFERAMT = #{record.minimumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAXPMTAMT = #{record.maximumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINPMTAMT = #{record.minimumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRNIMGVIEWLENGTH = #{record.trnImgViewLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, HISTRETENTIONLGTH = #{record.historyRetentionLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FIID = #{record.fiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCHID = #{record.branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTCODE = #{record.productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HISTREQUESTCD = #{record.histRequestCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ACCTNAME = #{record.accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIIDTYPE = #{record.fiIdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDTTM = #{record.updateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEUSER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSIONSTAMP = #{record.versionStamp,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FIIDTYPEENUM = #{record.fiIdTypeEnum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, DSPLYCDIRFIID = #{record.displayCDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DSPLYPDIRFIID = #{record.displayPDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANKNAME = #{record.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE = #{record.defaultHistoryTrnDateRange,jdbcType=SMALLINT}

update BNKACCT
BNKPRODUCTKY = #{productOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler},
ISOCURRENCYCDKY = #{isoCurrencyCdOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler},
HISTORYSTATUSCD = #{historyStatusCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
ACCTID = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERESTRATE = #{interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HISTENDDATE = #{historyEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ISSRCXFERENABLED = #{isSrcXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
ISDESTXFERENABLED = #{isDestXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler},
MAXXFERAMT = #{maximumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MINXFERAMT = #{minimumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAXPMTAMT = #{maximumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MINPMTAMT = #{minimumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRNIMGVIEWLENGTH = #{trnImgViewLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
HISTRETENTIONLGTH = #{historyRetentionLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FIID = #{fiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCHID = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTCODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HISTREQUESTCD = #{histRequestCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
ACCTNAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIIDTYPE = #{fiIdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEDTTM = #{updateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEUSER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSIONSTAMP = #{versionStamp,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FIIDTYPEENUM = #{fiIdTypeEnum,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
DSPLYCDIRFIID = #{displayCDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DSPLYPDIRFIID = #{displayPDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKNAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE = #{defaultHistoryTrnDateRange,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where BNKACCTKY = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}

update BNKACCT set BNKPRODUCTKY = #{productOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}, ISOCURRENCYCDKY = #{isoCurrencyCdOid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}, HISTORYSTATUSCD = #{historyStatusCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ACCTID = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERESTRATE = #{interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HISTENDDATE = #{historyEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ISSRCXFERENABLED = #{isSrcXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler}, ISDESTXFERENABLED = #{isDestXferEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ZeroOneBooleanTypeHandler}, MAXXFERAMT = #{maximumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINXFERAMT = #{minimumTransferAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAXPMTAMT = #{maximumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINPMTAMT = #{minimumPaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRNIMGVIEWLENGTH = #{trnImgViewLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, HISTRETENTIONLGTH = #{historyRetentionLength,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FIID = #{fiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCHID = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTCODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HISTREQUESTCD = #{histRequestCode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ACCTNAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIIDTYPE = #{fiIdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDTTM = #{updateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEUSER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSIONSTAMP = #{versionStamp,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FIIDTYPEENUM = #{fiIdTypeEnum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, DSPLYCDIRFIID = #{displayCDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DSPLYPDIRFIID = #{displayPDIrFiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANKNAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DFLTHISTTRNDTRANGE = #{defaultHistoryTrnDateRange,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where BNKACCTKY = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER,typeHandler=com.s1.arch.ibatis.ObjectIdTypeHandler}
